>
[Ring of Discretion](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2345)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Invested" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=98" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
<trait label="Visual" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=163" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 154 <sup>2.0</sup>, [Pathfinder #157: Devil at the Dreaming Palace](/Sources.aspx?ID=45) pg. 80

**Price** 15 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** worn

</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

A _ring of discretion_ magically conceals any armor and sheathed weapons you're wearing by either turning them [invisible](/Conditions.aspx?ID=26) or creating the illusion of ordinary clothes. The ring doesn't change your appearance beyond concealing weapons and armor. As soon as you wield a weapon affected by the ring, the weapon becomes obvious to onlookers and is no longer affected until you sheathe the weapon for at least 1 minute. A creature can use the [Seek](/Actions.aspx?ID=84) action to examine you and [disbelieve](/Rules.aspx?ID=267) this illusion (DC 15), and it can attempt to do so without using an action each time it hits you with an attack.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
